this includes necessary main header file 20 24 #define ST_FSYS_DIVIDE_4 0 25 #define ST_FSYS 1 26 #define ST_FH_DIVIDE_16 2 27 #define ST_FH_DIVIDE_64 3 28 #define ST_FSUB1 4 29 #define ST_FSUB2 5 30 #define ST_STCK_RISING 6 31 #define ST_STCK_FALLING 7 32 //========================================================================= 33 #define STIMER_CLOCK ST_FSYS 34 //========================================================================= 35 39 #define STM_1024_CLOCKS 0 40 #define STM_128_CLOCKS 1 41 #define STM_256_CLOCKS 2 42 #define STM_384_CLOCKS 3 43 #define STM_512_CLOCKS 4 44 #define STM_640_CLOCKS 5 45 #define STM_768_CLOCKS 6 46 #define STM_896_CLOCKS 7 47 //========================================================================= 48 #define STM_PERIOD STM_1024_CLOCKS 49 //========================================================================= 50 54 #define STM_COMPARE_MATCH_OUTPUT_MODE 0 55 #define STM_TIMER_COUNTER_MODE 1 56 #define STM_CAPTURE_INPUT_MODE 2 57 #define STM_PWM_OUTPUT_MODE 3 58 #define STM_SINGLE_PULSE_OUTPUT_MODE 4 59 //========================================================================= 60 #define STM_MODE STM_COMPARE_MATCH_OUTPUT_MODE 61 //========================================================================= 62 66 #define NO_CHANGE 0 67 #define OUTPUT_LOW 1 68 #define OUTPUT_HIGH 2 69 #define TOGGLE_OUTPUT 3 70 // PWM Output Mode/Single Pulse Output Mode 71 #define PWM_OUTPUT_INACTIVE_STATE 0 72 #define PWM_OUTPUT_ACTIVE_STATE 1 73 #define PWM_OUTPUT 2 74 #define SINGLE_PULSE_ACTIVE_STATE 3 75 // Capture Input Mode 76 #define INPUT_CAPTURE_AT_RISING_EDGE 0 77 #define INPUT_CAPTURE_AT_FULLING_EDGE 1 78 #define INPUT_CAPTURE_BOTH_RISING_FULLING_EDGE 2 79 #define INPUT_CAPTURE_DISABLE 3 80 //========================================================================= 81 #define STM_PIN_FUNCTION NO_CHANGE 82 //========================================================================= 83 87 #define INITIAL_LOW 0 88 #define INITIAL_HIGH 1 89 // PWM Output Mode/Single Pulse Output Mode 90 #define ACTIVE_LOW 0 91 #define ACTIVE_HIGH 1 92 //========================================================================= 93 #define STM_OUTPUT_MODE INITIAL_LOW 94 //========================================================================= 95 99 #define STM_COUNTER_OFF 0 100 #define STM_COUNTER_ON 1 101 //========================================================================= 102 #define STM_COUNTER STM_COUNTER_ON 103 //========================================================================= 104 108 #define STM_NON_INVERT 0 109 #define STM_INVERT 1 110 //========================================================================= 111 #define STM_OUTPUT_POLARITY STM_NON_INVERT 112 //========================================================================= 113 117 #define STM_DUTY 1 118 #define STM_PERIOD 0 119 //========================================================================= 120 #define STM_PWM_DUTY STM_DUTY 121 //========================================================================= 122 126 #define STM_COMPARE_MATCH_P 0 127 #define STM_COMPARE_MATCH_A 1 128 //========================================================================= 129 #define STM_SELECT_CLEAR_COMPARE_MATCH STM_COMPARE_MATCH_A 130 //========================================================================= 131 135 #define STM_CCRA_LOW_BYTE_MASK 0x01 // Mask for STM CCRA low byte Max=0xFF Min=1 136 //========================================================================= 137 141 #define STM_CCRA_HIGH_BYTE_MASK 0x0 // Mask for STM CCRA high byte Max=0x03 142
